com.roobo.core.service

Class ServiceFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.roobo.core.service.ServiceFetcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.IBinder.DeathRecipient

    public class ServiceFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.IBinder.DeathRecipient
    Created by bro2 on 17-4-24. service获取帮助类，当获取失败或者service的binder死亡后会在指定线程做延时重连
    类初始化时会自动创建一个HandlerThread为那些不指定重连线程的调用者使用
    当获取service成功后会自动调用ServiceFetcher＃mOnConnectedCallback的run方法
